settings.content: Whether you're curious about new products, need skincare advice, or have questions about your order, we're here to help! Reach us via email, phone or chat, Monday-Friday 8am-5pm PST, excluding US holidays. Feeling shy? Check out our FAQs for answers to frequently asked questions.

settings.title: What is an FAQ section?
settings.text:
An FAQ section can be used to quickly answer common questions about you or your business, such as “Where do you ship to?”, “What are your opening hours?” or “How can I book a service?”

It’s a great way to help people navigate your site and can even boost your site’s SEO.

settings.title: Hours of Operations

Hours of Operation:

settings.title: Is MalibuMD Developed by Medical Professionals?
settings.text: You may find information and get to know our CEO and Founder of MalibuMD here.

settings.title: Which Product Suits me best?
settings.text:
Below are the top products our loved Customers purchase from us:

Miracle Lift Face Cream

Age Defying Eye Serum

Caviar Gel Eye Patch

If you want firmer, younger-looking skin then you can’t go wrong with any of the options as you’re going to love what you see in the mirror whichever option you choose.

settings.title: Can I use MalibuMD with makeup or other beauty products?
settings.text:
Yes! Our formula works amazingly well with any skincare regimen (although most customers find they no longer need other “anti-aging” products).

Apply MalibuMD Miracle Lift Face Cream after cleansing, and simply wait 15 minutes for our light, silky cream to fully absorb before using makeup.

It won’t affect the way your makeup goes on and it won’t change the color or texture of your foundation.

For best results, use daily in combination with MalibuMD AGE-DEFYING EYE SERUM

settings.title: How quickly can I expect to see improvement when using MalibuMD products?
settings.text: Malibu MD's products are crafted to initiate results promptly. You may begin to observe a difference in as little as 21 days, with even more noticeable and dramatic results typically occurring after three months.

settings.title: Are Malibu MD's Ingredients Safe?
settings.text: Yes, Malibu MD is completely safe! All of our ingredients are sourced for their quality. Please come back 12.01.23, We are currently adding more content to better help you navigate our website!

settings.title: Is your product FDA-approved?
settings.text:
The Site does not provide medical advice and is not engaged in rendering medical or professional services or advice, and the information provided on the Site is not intended to replace medical advice offered by a health care provider. We strongly recommend that you promptly consult a physician or professional healthcare provider prior to the use of any product. Neither the product nor the ingredients in the product have been approved or endorsed by the FDA or any regulatory agency for the treatment of obesity or to cause weight loss.

If you are pregnant, nursing, taking medication, or have a medical condition, we suggest consulting with a physician before using any of our products. Any testimonials on this website are based on individual results and do not constitute a guarantee that you will achieve the same results.

settings.title: Product Ingredients?
settings.text:
We source only the highest-quality ingredients to bring you the best products on the market. These ingredients were picked out for a very specific purpose. Pick an ingredient in order to read more about its functionality in Malibu MD's formulations.

You may click the following link to view our Product Ingredients.

settings.title: Are your products Organic?
settings.text:
Not Exactly but we can guarantee its effectiveness!

Malibu MD was conceptualized with two primary objectives. Firstly, to offer secure, convenient, and cost-effective access to high-quality daily skincare products. Secondly, to educate the public about misconceptions related to anti-aging and the scientific basis behind our formulations. This commitment is reflected in Malibu MD's dedication to complete transparency for all our products.

settings.title: How do I log in or Sign up with my Account?
settings.text:
1. Go to our website - https://www.malibumd.com/
  2. Click Log in located on the upper right corner of the page.

3. You can sign up with Google, Facebook or email.

4. You may also click "log in" If you already have an account.

You may also contact our Customer Support for assistance by sending an email to info@malibumd.com

or call 833-473-0805 Daily from 8am-5pm PST.

settings.title: What is the difference between Age Defying Eye Serum and Moisturizing Caviar Gel Eye Patch?
settings.text:
1. Age Defying Eye Serum:

  2. Moisturizing Caviar Gel Eye Patch:

Combining Usage:

  • Some individuals choose to incorporate both products into their skincare routine. For example, using the Age Defying Eye Serum regularly and incorporating the Moisturizing Caviar Gel Eye Patches on specific occasions for an added hydration boost.

Note: It's actually best to use both Age Defying Eye Serum & Moisturizing Caviar Gel Eye Patch at the same time for the best result.

settings.title: Can MalibuMD products help prevent Wrinkles?
settings.text:
We have addressed one of the many questions from our customers, ensuring that we provide a comprehensive answer. Our team has prepared a blog post where you can find tips, understand the causes, and discover the best products we offer for situations like this.

Feel free to click the following link to learn about what causes wrinkles and how to prevent them and know what are the best MalibuMD products to use for Wrinkles.

settings.title: Where does Malibu MD Ship to?
settings.text:
Malibu MD, only ships within the United States. To purchase Malibu MD products outside the United States, visit one of our hundreds of approved eCommerce vendors. Find us on Amazon or Google shop.

Does Malibu MD ship to PO Boxes or non-residential addresses?

Of course we do!

settings.title: What are shipping options & how long does it take?
settings.text:
Malibu MD typically ships via US Postal Service unless otherwise stated on your order. Orders are normally shipped within 48 hours of purchase and are delivered within five to seven business days based on customer location. Malibu MD offers expedited shipping through USPS upon checkout.

Standard shipping sent via USPS First Class will arrive in 3-5 business days.

Shipping delays caused by USPS are out of control of Malibu MD's fulfillment. You can contact your local USPS office for further details using the tracking code emailed to you upon shipment.

Please see our Shipping Policy for more details

settings.title: My order didn’t arrive when it was supposed to – what do I do?
settings.text:
If your order has not arrived within the expected timeframe, please reach out to our Support Team with your name and order number. A customer service representative will contact you and ensure that any issues are resolved.

If you see a hold up in your tracking, please try to contact your local USPS office. USPS will be able to check on any shipping delays.

settings.title: How do I place an order?
settings.text:
1. Just go to our website https://www.malibumd.com/
  2. Click on “Shop now” or you can simply click the following link https://www.malibumd.com/shop-malibu
  3. It will redirect you to a new page with all our products, Select the product you’d like to purchase.
  4. Once you select the product or click “add to cart” It will redirect you to the product page.
  5. Please select “one-time purchase” if you only want to purchase one time
    It will then show you the option to add it to your cart or pay it through Paypal or Google pay.
  • If you click on add to cart - it will just be simply added to your cart so you can purchase multiple items.
  • If you click on Paypal or Google Pay, a browser will pop up asking you to log in.

6. You may also select “Forever Young” Which means you will be paying monthly
subscription with us with auto shipment and auto payment at and lesser price!

  • After clicking Forever Young, please click “Subscribe Now”

7. It will then direct you to the Checkout Page

8. Select the shipping option/Delivery Method.

9. Add a payment method.

10. It will then ask you to review and place the order.



You may also contact our Customer Support for assistance by sending an email to info@malibumd.com or calling 833-473-0805 Daily from 8 am to 5 pm PST.

settings.title: Where do I redeem my Gift Card?
settings.text: Similar to redeeming a promo code, when you're at the checkout page, you'll find 'Redeem a gift card' located on the right side within the Order Summary section. This option is positioned just below 'Enter a promo code.' Simply click on 'Apply' after selecting it.

settings.title: Where do I sign up to get a discount on my first purchase with Malibu?
settings.text:
1. Just go to our website - https://www.malibumd.com/
  2. Scroll down the bottom of the page, add your email address then click “Join”

settings.title: Returns & Refund
settings.text:
You may click the following link to view our Terms of Sale and Refund Policy.

​

We will credit one returned unopened product per customer if the received package is postmarked within 30 days of the original order date and included with an RMA number obtained from customer service. If within 30 days customers complain about the product, a 30-50% refund may be issued. Refunds will be issued to the customer's credit card within 3 business days. No returns are credited after 30 days of the original order date. Any merchandise must be returned at the customer's expense and must have an RMA number marked on it. No returns are credited if they are not accompanied by an RMA number. No refunds will be issued for any used product. You may request an RMA and instructions on how to submit a return by emailing info@malibumd.com or calling +1 (833)-473-0805.

​

Please read our Satisfaction Guarantee Policy to ​see if your purchase qualifies for our hassle-free return.

settings.text:

or calling 833-473-0805 Daily from 8 am-5 pm PST.

settings.title: Can I still modify my order once it’s placed?
settings.text: If you've placed an order and would like to modify the items, please contact our Customer Care team by emailinginfo@malibumd.comor calling +1 833-473-0805. If the order has not shipped, we can modify the order to your liking. If the order has shipped, you will then need to follow the return/exchange process.

settings.title: What should I do if my order arrives incomplete?
settings.text:
• Document the Issue: Note down what items are missing from your order. It's also helpful to take pictures of the received package and any packing slips or invoices included.

  • You may also Contact our Customer Support: Reach out to the provided email (info@malibumd.com) or

call (+1 833-473-0805) immediately. Provide them with your order number and details regarding the missing items. Be clear and concise about
what's missing and any other relevant information.
